definition: minced meat sauce/(fig.) mincemeat/a person cut to pieces
meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130
thick paste of fermented soybean/marinated in soy paste/paste/jam

sentences.english: At supper she had two huge plates full of lasagna.
sentences.chinese: 晚饭时她吃了两大碗满满当当的肉酱宽面条。

sentences.english: Serve the sauce over fresh tagliatelle.
sentences.chinese: 将肉酱倒在新鲜面条上。

sentences.english: I really like spaghetti with meat sauce .
sentences.chinese: 我真的喜欢肉酱义大利面。

sentences.english: Look, here comes a mutton chop with lots of gravy smeared on top.
sentences.chinese: 看哪，这是一个上面抹了很多肉酱的羊排。

sentences.english: A touch extra virgin olive oil around Bolognese and pasta.
sentences.chinese: 在肉酱和面条上撒些初榨橄榄油。

sentences.english: Hannah, tell her you don't want meat sauce on your spaghetti.
sentences.chinese: 汉娜，告诉她你吃意大利细面条的时候不喜欢放肉酱。

sentences.english: This wine is best paired with Pasta Bolognese or spicy pork tenderloin with wilted arugula.
sentences.chinese: 配搭肉酱意大利面条或辣味里脊猪肉。

sentences.english: You can get poutine with chili sauce or even spaghetti meat sauce.
sentences.chinese: 你可以要份布丁配辣椒酱甚至是肉酱意大利细面条。

sentences.english: They have a wide variety of BBQ sauces to choose from.
sentences.chinese: 他们有自己独特的烤肉酱，满不同口味的。

sentences.english: Please use the brush to put the BBQ sauce on the beef.
sentences.chinese: 请把烤肉酱用刷子刷在牛排上。

sentences.english: If she didn't want her son " cut to ribbons" she had better keep him at home.
sentences.chinese: 她不想让儿子给“剁成肉酱”，就最好把他关在家中。

sentences.english: I bought expensive pasta and sauce etc.
sentences.chinese: 于是我买了很贵的意大利面和肉酱，看上去非常美味。

sentences.english: Introducing the Spaghetti Ice Cream Maker.
sentences.chinese: 隆重介绍意大利肉酱面冰淇淋制造器。

sentences.english: Helen will cook spaghetti with meat sauce tonight.
sentences.chinese: 海伦今晚将煮加肉酱的意大利面。

sentences.english: Celery in one. Steak in another.
sentences.chinese: 比如芹菜室，牛排室，还有肉酱室。

definition: to break down/to break into pieces/fragmentary
